An approach was developed here to correct for band differences, a process referred to as band shifting. Band-shifting schemes have been developed for validation analyses, with some of these approaches relying on relationships proposed for clear open-ocean waters or for specific regions (e.g., [ 49, 50, 51, 52]). The approach developed here is a more general one, based on the Quasi-Analytical Algorithm (QAA) [ 19], and was devised to map all the normalised
